title: League of Legends is Lagging?
body: My whole client is lagging and it made me dodge my ranked game because of the delay. my internet is completely fine however only league is the problem.

replies.body: Have you tried restarting the client? If that didn't work maybe restarting your laptop or your internet connection. If none of these work just reinstall league. This happened to me before and restarting my computer did the trick for me.
i have this aswell, constant ping strikes all game.
